mapper.select: select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.id = #{orderId} and o.serviceId = s.id
select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{id} and o.serviceId = s.id order by o.create_date desc
select o.* from cs_task t join cs_order_asset oa on t.order_asset_Id = oa.id join cs_order o on oa.orderId = o.id where t.taskId = #{taskId}
mapper.insert: insert into cs_order (id, type, begin_date, end_date, serviceId, create_date, task_date, scan_type, userId, contactId, remarks, status, websoc) values(#{id}, #{type}, #{begin_date}, #{end_date}, #{serviceId}, #{create_date}, #{task_date}, #{scan_type}, #{userId}, #{contactId}, #{remarks}, #{status}, #{websoc})
